snippet: private StringBuilder accum = new StringBuilder(); // holds the accumulated text

comment: by default, error tracking is disabled.

comment: current doc we are building into

comment: current base uri, for creating new elements

comment: currentToken is used only for error tracking.

snippet: protected ParseErrorList errors; // null when not tracking errors
private String pendingAttributeName; // attribute names are generally caught in one hop, not accumulated
comment: attribute names are generally caught in one hop, not accumulated

snippet: private StringBuilder pendingAttributeValue; // but values are accumulated, from e.g. & in hrefs
comment: but values are accumulated, from e.g. & in hrefs

snippet: Attributes attributes; // start tags get attributes on construction. End tags get attributes on first new attribute (but only for parser convenience, not used).
comment: start tags get attributes on construction. End tags get attributes on first new attribute (but only for parser convenience, not used).

snippet: static final char replacementChar = '\uFFFD'; // replaces null character
private ParseErrorList errors; // errors found while tokenising
private TokeniserState state = TokeniserState.Data; // current tokenisation state
private Token emitPending; // the token we are about to emit on next read
comment: the token we are about to emit on next read

comment: buffers characters to output as one token

comment: the last start tag emitted, to test appropriate end tag

comment: fragment parse context -- could be null even if fragment parsing

comment: chars in table to be shifted out

comment: can self close (<foo />). used for unknown tags that self close, without forcing them as empty.

comment: used if not found in header or meta charset

comment: <! if true, <? if false, declaration (and last data char should be ?)

TextNode is a node, and so by default comes with attributes and children. The attributes are seldom used, but use
    memory, and the child nodes are never used. So we don't have them, and override accessors to attributes to create
    them as needed on the fly.

snippet: private Set<TagName> tagNames; // tags allowed, lower case. e.g. [p, br, span]
comment: tags allowed, lower case. e.g. [p, br, span]

snippet: private Map<TagName, Set<AttributeKey>> attributes; // tag -> attribute[]. allowed attributes [href] for a tag.
comment: tag -> attribute[]. allowed attributes [href] for a tag.

snippet: private Map<TagName, Map<AttributeKey, AttributeValue>> enforcedAttributes; // always set these attribute values
private Map<TagName, Map<AttributeKey, Set<Protocol>>> protocols; // allowed URL protocols for attributes
private boolean preserveRelativeLinks; // option to preserve relative links
